title: The East End Butcher Boy
description: Joe is a typical 14 year old growing up in Londons East End. His mum gets him a job as a Saturday boy at the local Butchers shop. His life will never be the same again.A story of friendship, loyalty, violence, crime and betrayal.Imagine Goodfellas set in East London.Welcome to THe East End Butcher Boy.
author: Joe E. Lawrence
